name: ether (Cosmin)
description:
ether is a sandbox/voxel game, it seems like a familiar place, but it's different, maybe it's a dream, or a deep memory, but it's a game or a story, your story, but the dark environment will get you.

Early access / Alpha:

This game version is not fully complete, and it will change during this stage, this game will be in alpha untill 31 March 2023, after a pause a new early access/alpha will be released for feedback.

Note: Currently the game might have some bugs (100% it does have) but feel free to report any bugs you find on the itch discussion board this page will have.
